languages.text: "Он желал знаний. Теодора дала ему исследовать дары Эпитафии, утолив его жажду. Но мы знаем, что это не принесло ему счастья. За утоленной жаждой след в след пришел страх".
"He desired knowledge. Theodora allowed him to explore the gifts of Epitaph, slaking his thirst. But we know it did not bring him happiness. In the footprints of his slaked thirst, fear followed."
languages.original_text: "Он желал знаний. Теодора дала ему исследовать дары Эпитафии, утолив его жажду. Но мы знаем, что это не принесло ему счастья. За утоленной жаждой след в след пришел страх".

traits.locale_text: "He desired knowledge. Theodora allowed him to explore the gifts of Epitaph, slaking his thirst. But we know it did not bring him happiness. In the footprints of his slaked thirst, fear followed."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

traits.locale_text: "He desired knowledge. Theodora allowed him to explore the gifts of Epitaph, slaking his thirst. But we know it did not bring him happiness. In the footprints of his slaked thirst, fear followed."

languages.text: «Quería conocimiento. Theodora le permitió explorar los regalos de Epitafio para saciar su sed. Pero sabemos que eso no le dio le felicidad. A la saciedad de su sed le siguió el miedo».
languages.original_text: "He desired knowledge. Theodora allowed him to explore the gifts of Epitaph, slaking his thirst. But we know it did not bring him happiness. In the footprints of his slaked thirst, fear followed."

traits.locale_text: «Quería conocimiento. Theodora le permitió explorar los regalos de Epitafio para saciar su sed. Pero sabemos que eso no le dio le felicidad. A la saciedad de su sed le siguió el miedo».
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: 「彼は知識を求めていた。シオドーラはエピタフの贈り物を探す許可を与えて、彼の渇望を満たした。しかし、彼は幸せにならなかったことを我々は知っている。知識の渇望を満たすごとに、彼は恐怖した」
languages.original_text: "He desired knowledge. Theodora allowed him to explore the gifts of Epitaph, slaking his thirst. But we know it did not bring him happiness. In the footprints of his slaked thirst, fear followed."

traits.locale_text: 「彼は知識を求めていた。シオドーラはエピタフの贈り物を探す許可を与えて、彼の渇望を満たした。しかし、彼は幸せにならなかったことを我々は知っている。知識の渇望を満たすごとに、彼は恐怖した」
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: “他渴求知识，而西奥多拉允许他探索荒垄碑碣所赠与的礼物，来满足他的渴望。但我们知道，这并没有给他带来幸福。在他的渴望被满足后，恐惧紧随他的脚步而来。”
languages.original_text: "He desired knowledge. Theodora allowed him to explore the gifts of Epitaph, slaking his thirst. But we know it did not bring him happiness. In the footprints of his slaked thirst, fear followed."

traits.locale_text: “他渴求知识，而西奥多拉允许他探索荒垄碑碣所赠与的礼物，来满足他的渴望。但我们知道，这并没有给他带来幸福。在他的渴望被满足后，恐惧紧随他的脚步而来。”
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: « Il était en quête de savoir. Théodora lui a permis d'explorer les dons d'Épitaphe pour étancher sa soif. Cependant, nous savons que cela ne lui a pas apporté le bonheur, car la peur marchait dans les pas de sa soif étanchée. »
languages.original_text: "He desired knowledge. Theodora allowed him to explore the gifts of Epitaph, slaking his thirst. But we know it did not bring him happiness. In the footprints of his slaked thirst, fear followed."

traits.locale_text: « Il était en quête de savoir. Théodora lui a permis d'explorer les dons d'Épitaphe pour étancher sa soif. Cependant, nous savons que cela ne lui a pas apporté le bonheur, car la peur marchait dans les pas de sa soit étanchée. »
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: "Er strebte nach Wissen. Theodora gestattete ihm, die Geschenke von Epitaph zu erkunden, seinen Durst zu stillen. Doch wir wissen, dass ihn das nicht glücklich gemacht hat. In den Fußstapfen seines gestillten Dursts folgte Angst."
languages.original_text: "He desired knowledge. Theodora allowed him to explore the gifts of Epitaph, slaking his thirst. But we know it did not bring him happiness. In the footprints of his slaked thirst, fear followed."

traits.locale_text: "Er strebte nach Wissen. Theodora gestattete ihm, die Geschenke von Epitaph zu erkunden, seinen Durst zu stillen. Doch wir wissen, dass ihn das nicht glücklich gemacht hat. In den Fußstapfen seines gestillten Dursts folgte Angst."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: "Bilgi edinmek istiyordu. Theodora, Sinyazıt'ın lütuflarını keşfetmesine izin vererek bu arzusunu tatmin etti. Fakat biliyoruz ki bu onu mutlu etmeyecek, tatmin oluşunun ardından korku takip edecekti."
languages.original_text: "He desired knowledge. Theodora allowed him to explore the gifts of Epitaph, slaking his thirst. But we know it did not bring him happiness. In the footprints of his slaked thirst, fear followed."

traits.locale_text: "Bilgi edinmek istiyordu. Theodora, Kitabe'nin lütuflarını keşfetmesine izin vererek bu arzusunu tatmin etti. Fakat biliyoruz ki bu, onu mutlu etmeyecek; tatmin oluşunun ardından korku takip edecekti."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos
